content.rendered:
MD’s Message

Md. Mofazzal Hossain Pavel

Managing Director

Dongyi Sourcing Limited.

First of all, thank you so much and I am really grateful to you / your company for your unified support. Over the last two years, Dongyi Sourcing Limited (DSL) has built a reputation for being an ethical buying office /business partner for brands & manufacturers. I take great pride in the long-term relationships we have, highlighting the strengths within our core values and culture of the business.

Our priority still remains our clients, business partners who are at the forefront of our achievements. DSL believes in quality, commitment & service. My request to our business partners to maintain your continuous support with ethical & integrity. DSL will not compromise for anything on quality, commitment & service.

Customer's & Business partner's satisfaction is one of the central aspects of our organizational culture. Total Customer's & Business partner's satisfaction is the only success formula that drives us to be in this competitive fashion clothing industry. I would like to sincerely thank our valued clients & business partners for your continued support in ensuring that we remain our long-term relationship to have good business in future.


Thank You

I take great pride in the long-term relationships we have, highlighting the strengths within our core values and culture of the business.
